sentence: Inicio oficial de la segunda fase de la European University of Technology (EUt+) en la ciudad chipriota de Pafos.
translation: Official launch of the second phase of the European University of Technology (EUt+) in the Cypriot city of Pafos.

sentence: EUt+ Accelerate garantiza una financiación de 14,4 millones de euros hasta 2027 a través de "Universidades Europeas" del programa Erasmus+.
translation: EUt+ Accelerate guarantees funding of 14.4 million euros until 2027 through "European Universities" of the Erasmus+ program.

sentence: En este encuentro, que se celebra esta semana, participan 120 representantes de las nueve universidades socias de la alianza EUt+.
translation: At this meeting, which is taking place this week, 120 representatives from the nine partner universities of the EUt+ alliance are participating.

sentence: La UPCT se unió en 2020 a este consorcio universitario patrocinado por la Unión Europea.
translation: The UPCT joined this university consortium sponsored by the European Union in 2020.

sentence: EUt+ está formada por la UPCT y las universidades de Cluj-Napoca (Rumanía), Darmstadt (Alemania), Dublín (Irlanda), Limassol (Chipre), Riga (Letonia), Sofía (Bulgaria), Troyes (Francia) y Cassino (Italia).
translation: EUt+ is formed by the UPCT and the universities of Cluj-Napoca (Romania), Darmstadt (Germany), Dublin (Ireland), Limassol (Cyprus), Riga (Latvia), Sofia (Bulgaria), Troyes (France), and Cassino (Italy).

sentence: La UPCT participa con apoyo de la Consejería de Empresa, Empleo, Universidades y Portavocía de la CARM y con el respaldo del Ministerio de Universidades.
translation: The UPCT participates with the support of the Ministry of Enterprise, Employment, Universities, and Spokesperson of the Region of Murcia and with the backing of the Ministry of Universities.

sentence: Además, la UPCT es la primera de las universidades de la Región de Murcia en participar en la iniciativa Universidades Europeas que impulsa la Comisión Europea.
translation: In addition, the UPCT is the first of the universities in the Region of Murcia to participate in the European Universities initiative promoted by the European Commission.
